sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors and management of Harley-Davidson, Inc., we invite you to attend  the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 10:00 a.m., Central Daylight Time, on Saturday,  April 29, 2017, at the Harley-Davidson Museum, 400 West Canal Street, Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement describe the formal  business that the shareholders will transact at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the Annual Meeting, there will  also be brief reports on operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the business of the Annual Meeting is concluded, shareholders  will have an opportunity to ask questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are furnishing proxy materials to our shareholders via the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process expedites the delivery  of proxy materials, ensures that proxy materials remain easily accessible to shareholders and provides  clear instructions for receiving materials and voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 20, 2017, we mailed our Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, which contains  instructions for use of this process, including how to access our Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual  Report on Form 10-K and how to vote via the internet, mail or telephone, or in person at our 2017  Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials contains  instructions on how you may receive a printed copy of the Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report on  Form 10-K.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We sincerely hope you will be able to attend our Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, whether or not you are  personally present, it is important that you vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares through a broker, bank or other nominee, please vote your shares by providing your  broker, bank or nominee with your voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your ongoing support of Harley-Davidson, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely yours,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael J. Cave Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Matthew S. Levatich
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street name holders may also vote via telephone or the internet if their bank, broker or other  nominee makes those methods available, in which case the bank, broker or other nominee will enclose the  instructions along with this Proxy Statement.

sentences.text: Item 2 To approve, by advisory vote, the compensation of our named  executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board unanimously recommends that you vote FOR this proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E X E C U T I V E  C O M P E N S AT I O N  G O A L S  A N D  G U I D I N G  P R I N C I P L E S
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should create and reinforce pay for performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exceptional  performance should result in increased compensation, but missing performance goals should result in  reduced or no incentive pay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should encourage both the desired results and the right behaviors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It  should strike a balance so the company delivers near-term results that drive long-term performance,  while incorporating risk-mitigating features to ensure the compensation program does not encourage  excessive risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should align the interests of management with the interests of  shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of executive compensation should be equity-based, with required  minimum stock ownership guidelines designed to appropriately focus our management on long-term,  sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should ensure our performance goals align with our strategy and  operating plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance goals should be challenging, yet achievable during the applicable  performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should provide a target total compensation opportunity that keeps us  competitive in our industry for the size and scale of our company, so we can attract top executive  talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program includes a base salary, market competitive employee benefits,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning in 2016, we  eliminated stock options  and cash-based long-term  incentives and replaced them  with performance shares to  provide a more direct connection between performance relative  to key measures and the  rewards that result from that  performance.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: S T R E N G T H E N I N G  T H E  L I N K  B E T W E E N  PAY  A N D  P E R F O R M A N C E
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning in 2016 and continuing for 2017, we moved to further strengthen the link between  compensation and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we modified several elements of our executive  compensation program by increasing the amount of compensation that is classified as performance- based and reconfigured our long-term incentive plan to better align long-term executive rewards  with long-term shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples include eliminating the use of stock options and our  cash-based long-term incentives and introducing performance shares, which only create value to  the executive when, at a minimum, we attain threshold performance over a three-year performance  period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, each named executive officer receives 67% of their long-term incentive award in the  form of performance shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2017, we set the maximum payout under the performance share  awards at 200% of target rather than the maximum 300% of target that we used in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Item 3 To consider the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation  of our named executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board unanimously recommends a vote in favor of submitting the advisory vote on the compensation  of our named executive officers to shareholders EVERY YEAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the executive compensation disclosure rules contained in Item 402 of Securities and  Exchange Commission (SEC) Regulation S-K, a say-when-on-pay vote must be submitted to shareholders  every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, we are asking shareholders whether the advisory vote on our named executive  officer (NEO) compensation should occur every year, once every two years or once every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You  may also abstain from voting on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After considering the benefits and consequences of each option for the frequency of submitting the advisory  vote on the compensation of our NEOs to shareholders, our Board recommends submitting the advisory vote  on the compensation of our NEOs to our shareholders every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of Harley-Davidson, Inc. requests the proxy accompanying this Proxy  Statement for use at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held on April 29, 2017 and  at any adjournment or postponement of that meeting (the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We first mailed the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to shareholders on March 20, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials instructs shareholders and beneficial  owners of our Common Stock on how they may access our proxy materials, which include  our Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K, via the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will not  receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you request to receive these materials by  following the instructions we provide later in this Proxy Statement and in the Notice of Internet  Availability of Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials will  instruct you on how you may access and review all of the important information contained in  the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials also instructs how you  may submit your proxy via the internet, mail or telephone, or in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If  you received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials by mail and would like to receive  a printed copy of our proxy materials, you should follow the instructions we provide later in this  Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As used in this Proxy Statement, we, our, the company or Harley-Davidson refers to  Harley-Davidson, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We operate in two business segments: the motorcycles and related  products segment and the financial services segment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HDMC refers to our motorcycles  and related products segment subsidiaries, which include the companies that do business as  Harley-Davidson Motor Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HDFS generally refers to our financial services segment,  which includes Harley-Davidson Financial Services, Inc. and its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders will elect ten directors at the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refreshed our Board of Directors  significantly in the last year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four of the director nominees - Ms. Sylvester and Messrs. Alstead,  Golston and Niccol - became directors after the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Restated Articles of Incorporation provide for a Board of Directors that has between six and  fifteen members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board determines the size from time to time by the vote of a majority of the  directors then in office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The entire Board is elected annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board currently consists of thirteen  members with terms that expire at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, current directors Donald A. James,  George L. Miles, Jr. and James A. Norling will not stand for re-election at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, on February 23, 2017, the Board acted to decrease its size from thirteen to ten directors,  effective as of the commencement of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By-laws have a majority vote standard for the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because this is an  uncontested election, the number of votes cast favoring each director nominees election must exceed  50% of the total number of votes cast with respect to that nominees election, including any votes  withheld, for shareholders to elect the nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shares not voted, whether due to abstentions or  broker non-votes, will not have an impact on the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you specify otherwise in your proxy, the persons you appointed will vote your shares FOR  the Board of Directors nominees that we name below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee becomes unable to serve, the  persons you appointed may vote your shares for another person that the Board designates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identified on the following pages are the ten director candidates that the Board of Directors  has nominated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All ten nominees have advised us that they will serve if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide the  following information for each nominee of the Board of Directors:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: name;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: age as of February 23, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: principal occupations for at least the past five years;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the names of any other public companies or relevant private companies where the  nominee or director currently serves as a director or has served during the past five  years; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the particular experience, qualifications, attributes or skills that led the Board to  conclude that the person should serve as a director for the company.

sentences.text: Nominees of the Board of Directors

sentences.text: TROY ALSTEAD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Age: 53 Director since February 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alstead is the founder of Harbor O5, LLC, which is developing a new restaurant  and social concept scheduled to open in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2016, Mr. Alstead retired  from Starbucks Corporation, an American coffee company and coffeehouse chain, after  24 years with the company, having most recently served as Chief Operating Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He  served as Chief Operating Officer beginning in 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2008 to 2014, he served  as that companys Chief Financial Officer and Chief Administrative Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally,  he served as Group President, Global Business Services from 2013 until his promotion  to Chief Operating Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alstead joined Starbucks in 1992 and over the years  served in a number of operational, general management, and finance roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alstead  spent a decade in Starbucks international business, including roles as Senior Leader  of Starbucks International, President Europe/Middle East/Africa headquartered in  Amsterdam, and Chief Operating Officer of Starbucks Greater China, headquartered in  Shanghai.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alstead is also a member of the board of directors of Levi Strauss & Co.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and Topgolf International, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Alsteads extensive background as an executive for  an international corporation with strong brand recognition makes him a valuable asset  to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: R. JOHN ANDERSON
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Age: 65 Director since 2010
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 2: APPROVAL, BY ADVISORY  VOTE, OF THE COMPENSATION OF OUR  NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our shareholders may approve, on a non-binding, advisory basis, our named executive officer  (NEO) compensation as disclosed in accordance with the executive compensation disclosure rules  contained in Item 402 of SEC Regulation S-K.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are seeking input from shareholders  with this advisory vote on the compensation of our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote on this proposal is not intended  to address any specific element of compensation; rather, the vote relates to the compensation of our  NEOs as disclosed in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section and the accompanying  executive compensation tables and narrative discussion contained in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  company asks that you support the compensation of our NEOs as so disclosed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because your vote  is advisory, it will not be binding on the Human Resources Committee, the Board or the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board will review the voting results and consider them when making future decisions  regarding executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation goals and guiding principles emphasize pay-for-performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  base several elements of our compensation upon delivering high levels of performance relative  to performance measures that the Human Resources Committee has approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the annual Financial Short-Term Incentive Plan (STIP) and the performance shares that we  granted for the first time in 2016 require that we achieve significant financial performance before  recipients are entitled to this compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the equity component of our compensation  program provides greater financial benefits when our stock price is increasing; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the  Leadership STIP generates payouts correlated to driving measurable improvements in key  capabilities that we believe are necessary for improved performance and competitive advantage  over time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goals and guiding principles are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should create and reinforce pay for performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Exceptional performance should result in increased compensation, but missing performance goals should result in reduced or no incentive pay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should encourage both the desired results and the right  behaviors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It should strike a balance so the company delivers near-term results that  drive long-term performance, while incorporating risk-mitigating features to ensure the  compensation program does not encourage excessive risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should align the interests of management with the  interests of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of executive compensation should  be equity-based, with required minimum stock ownership guidelines designed to  appropriately focus our management on long-term, sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should ensure our performance goals align with our  strategy and operating plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance goals should be challenging, yet  achievable during the applicable performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation program should provide a target total compensation opportunity that  keeps us competitive in our industry for the size and scale of our company, so we can  attract top executive talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program includes a base salary, market  competitive employee benefits, targeted short-term incentive awards and long-term  incentive awards valued as of their grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we have target compensation  levels, we employ flexibility and discretion so the company can attract and retain a highly- qualified and strong leadership team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our target compensation should be:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: at the 50th percentile of companies in similarly-sized businesses, subject to  differences by individuals within a range of plus or minus 20%; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: based upon a calculation of that percentile in which we weight the values for our  Manufacturing/Engineering Peer Group at 60% and the values for our Brand  Name/Consumer Goods Peer Group at 40% or, in the event values from the peer  groups are unavailable or inadequate, a calculation of that percentile using values  from the Aon Hewitt 2016 U.S. Total Compensation Measurement database.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HARLEY-DAVIDSON, INC. 2 0 1 7  P R O X Y  S TAT E M E N T 8
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: P R O P O S A L  2 :  A P P R O V A L ,  B Y  A D V I S O R Y  V O T E ,  O F  T H E  C O M P E N S AT I O N  O F  O U R  N A M E D  E X E C U T I V E  O F F I C E R S
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We describe the individual elements that make up our total compensation more fully in the  Compensation Discussion and Analysis section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our executive  compensation programs are structured to best support our company and our business objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation programs are substantially tied to our key objectives and delivering  shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the value we deliver to our shareholders declines, so does the  compensation we deliver to our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, our 2016 full-year results  adversely impacted executive compensation for 2016 because our compensation is  focused on pay-for-performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our failure to meet certain performance targets resulted  in executives receiving payouts below target under our STIP program and our cash-based  long-term incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain the highest level of oversight over our executive compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We closely monitor the compensation programs and pay levels of executives from other companies that we believe to be similar to the company in business characteristics  and economics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, for the reasons we discuss above, the Board recommends that shareholders vote  in favor of the compensation of our NEOs as disclosed pursuant to Item 402 of Regulation S-K,  including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, compensation tables and narrative discussion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The votes cast for this proposal must exceed the votes cast against this proposal for approval  of the compensation of our NEOs, assuming that a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of determining  the vote regarding this proposal, abstentions and broker non-votes do not constitute a vote for or  against the proposal and will be disregarded in the calculation of votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies solicited by  the Board will be voted FOR approval of the compensation unless a shareholder specifies otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR APPROVAL OF THE  COMPENSATION OF OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS AS DISCLOSED IN THE  COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS SECTION AND THE ACCOMPANYING  COMPENSATION TABLES AND NARRATIVE DISCUSSION CONTAINED IN THIS  PROXY STATEMENT.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 9
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 3: TO CONSIDER THE FREQUENCY  OF THE ADVISORY VOTE ON COMPENSATION  OF OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2011 Annual Meeting, our shareholders approved, on an advisory vote basis, holding an annual  advisory vote on our named executive officer (NEO) compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the executive  compensation disclosure rules contained in Item 402 of SEC Regulation S-K, this say-when-on-pay  vote must be submitted to shareholders every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After considering the benefits and consequences of the frequency of submitting the advisory vote on  the compensation of our NEOs to shareholders, the Board believes it is in the best interests of the  company and its shareholders to continue with our current practice by submitting the advisory vote on  the compensation of our NEOs to our shareholders every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the Board recommends that shareholders vote in favor of holding an advisory vote on the  compensation of our NEOs at an annual meeting of shareholders every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders should be  aware that they are not voting for or against the Boards recommendation regarding the frequency  of the advisory vote on NEO compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather, shareholders will be casting votes to recommend  to our Board an advisory vote on the compensation of our NEOs every year, once every two years or  once every three years, or they may abstain entirely from voting on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option on the frequency of the advisory vote on the compensation of our NEOs that receives the  most votes from shareholders will be considered by the Board and Human Resources Committee as  the shareholders recommendation as to the frequency of future advisory votes on the compensation  of our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the outcome of this advisory vote is not binding on us or the Board, the Board will  review and consider the outcome of this vote when making determinations as to when the advisory  vote on the compensation of our NEOs will again be submitted to shareholders for approval at our  annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE TO SUBMIT THE ADVISORY  VOTE ON THE COMPENSATION OF OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS TO  SHAREHOLDERS EVERY YEAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HARLEY-DAVIDSON, INC. 2 0 1 7  P R O X Y  S TAT E M E N T 10

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 4: RATIFICATION OF SELECTION  OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC  ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP , an independent registered public accounting firm, performed an audit of our  consolidated financial statements for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 and the effectiveness  of our internal control over financial reporting as of December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance  Committee is responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the  independent external auditors retained to audit our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance  Committee selected Ernst & Young LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for the 2017 fiscal year, and the committee is presenting this selection to shareholders for ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP has been retained as our external auditor since prior to our initial public offering  in 1986.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Ernst & Young LLP will be present at the Annual Meeting to respond to  shareholders questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, prior to the Annual Meeting, Ernst & Young LLP declines to act as our independent registered public  accounting firm or the Audit and Finance Committee does not want to use Ernst & Young LLP as our  independent registered public accounting firm, the Audit and Finance Committee will appoint another  independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee will present any new  independent registered public accounting firm for the shareholders to ratify at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If  the shareholders do not ratify the engagement of Ernst & Young LLP at the Annual Meeting, then the  Audit and Finance Committee will reconsider its selection of Ernst & Young LLP .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for  the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017, the votes cast for this proposal must exceed the votes  cast against it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of determining the vote regarding this proposal, abstentions and broker non-votes (if any) do not constitute a vote for or against the proposal and will be disregarded in  the calculation of votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you specify otherwise in your proxy, the persons you have  appointed will vote your shares FOR ratification of the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as our  independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We entered into an engagement letter with Ernst & Young LLP for its work in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The engagement  letter contains provisions that subject the company to alternative dispute resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The arbitration  panel has the power to make an award or impose a remedy if such award could be made or remedy  imposed by a court deciding the matter in the same jurisdiction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The arbitration panel has no power to  award non-monetary or equitable relief or to make an award or impose a remedy that is inconsistent  with any applicable agreement between the parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect that the audit work that Ernst & Young  LLP performs for 2017 will be subject to a similar engagement letter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, we hired Ernst & Young LLP to perform the annual  audit and to provide audit-related and tax services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee Charter  requires that the Audit and Finance Committee pre-approve all Ernst & Young LLP services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit  and Finance Committee also pre-approved all fees that we incurred for services that Ernst & Young  LLP provided.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit fees included fees for the audit of our consolidated financial statements and our internal control  over financial reporting as required by Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This category  also includes fees for audits provided in connection with government filings or services that generally  only the principal auditor can reasonably provide to a client, such as comfort letters, procedures  related to debt financing, consents and reviews of documents that we file with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit-related  services included audits of employee benefit plans, procedures related to securitization transactions  and consultation on accounting and internal control matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax services included tax advice,  planning, compliance and transaction consulting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assure continuing external auditor independence, the Audit and Finance Committee and its Chair  considers whether there should be a regular rotation of the independent external audit firms, reviews  and evaluates the lead audit partner and his or her team, and ensures the rotation of the lead audit  partner and other audit personnel as required applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance  Committee negotiates and has procedures for pre-approving all audit and non-audit services that  the independent registered public accounting firm provides.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These procedures include reviewing and  approving a budget for audit and permitted non-audit services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The budget includes a description of,  and a budgeted amount for, particular categories of non-audit services that are recurring in nature and  that we anticipate at the time we prepare the budget.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit and Finance Committee  has established a policy that the fees we pay for non-audit services must be less than the fees we  pay for audit and audit-related services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit and Finance Committee approval is required to exceed  the budget amount for a particular category of non-audit services and to engage the independent  registered public accounting firm for any non-audit services not included in the budget.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For both types  of pre-approval, the Audit and Finance Committee considers whether the services are consistent with  the SECs rules on auditor independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee also considers whether  the independent registered public accounting firm is best positioned to provide the most effective  and efficient service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee may delegate pre-approval authority to one  or more members of the Audit and Finance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee monitors  the services that our independent registered public accounting firm provides and the actual fees we  paid to the independent registered public accounting firm to ensure that the services are within the  parameters that the Audit and Finance Committee has approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of the Audit and Finance Committee and the Board believe the continued retention of  Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm is in the best interests of the  company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Human Resources Committee responsibilities identified in its Charter include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: establish goals and objectives with the CEO and evaluate at least annually the performance of  the CEO in light of these goals and objectives;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review and approve the total compensation of the CEO on an annual basis, including  base pay, with input from all of the independent directors on the Board (who comprise the  Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee) on the performance of the CEO in  meeting his or her goals and objectives and concerning the CEOs total compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review overall compensation policies and plans for executive officers and other employees  and, if necessary, recommend plans to shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: produce a report on compensation for inclusion in our proxy statement in accordance with  applicable rules and regulations and review the Compensation Discussion and Analysis tha we must include in our proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: exercise the authority of the Board to adopt and amend compensation plans for executive  officers and other employees and recommend plans to shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: evaluate company management performance overall and provide recommendation regarding management successors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: make recommendations regarding stock ownership levels of our executive officers and senior  leaders as set forth in our Stock Ownership Guidelines and monitor such levels;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review potential conflicts of interest and any other potential Code of Business Conduct  violations by any of our executive officers (other than the CEO);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review the disclosure of any waivers of such conflicts or other Code of Business Condu violations for executive officers (other than the CEO);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: make determinations regarding shareholder advisory votes on compensation of named  executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review our policies applicable to executive officers regarding trading and hedging involving  company securities.

sentences.text: C O M 15
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O R P O R AT E  G O V E R N A N C E  P R I N C I P L E S  A N D  B O A R D  M AT T E R S
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2016, the Human Resources Committee reviewed the Human Resources Committee  Charter and recommended to the Board certain changes to the charter, specifically to add language  regarding approval of performance-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that all members of the Human Resources Committee are  independent under New York Stock Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee has overall responsibility for reviewing total direct compensation  (consisting of base salaries, short-term incentive compensation and long-term incentive compensation)  for our senior leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Human Resources Committee reviews other aspects of  compensation, such as deferred compensation plans, retirement plans, and health and welfare plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee has the authority to engage the services of outside advisors, experts  and others to assist it in performing its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2010, the Human Resources Committee  has retained the services of Meridian Compensation Partners, LLC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Meridian  report to the Chair of the Human Resources Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On an annual basis, the Human Resources  Committee reviews and approves the scope of Meridians services regarding executive compensation,  Meridians performance and the fees related to work Meridian performed for the Human Resources  Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee retains the right to terminate Meridians services at any  time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridians primary responsibilities to the Human Resources Committee include providing:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independent competitive market data and advice related to our CEOs compensation level  and incentive design;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a review of our compensation levels, performance goals and incentive designs for the named executive officers; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: benchmark data on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee has considered all factors relevant to Meridians independence from  management and determined that Meridian is independent and that Meridians performance of services  raises no conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees conclusion was based in part on a report that Meridian  provided to the Committee intended to reveal any potential conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee annually approves several Short-Term Incentive Plans (STIPs)  to motivate and reward the performance of employees of Harley-Davidson and its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our  STIPs have broad-based participation and provide an opportunity to earn annual cash awards based  upon performance during the course of our fiscal year relative to financial goals or other performance  objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the beginning of each year, the Human Resources Committee reviews and approves  STIP performance measures and goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee also reviews and approves  target STIP opportunities for the Harley-Davidson Leadership Team (HDLT), which includes the  companys CEO and his direct reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the completion of the fiscal year, the Human Resources  Committee determines the extent to which actual performance satisfies the defined performance goals  for STIPs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, we grant equity-based long-term incentives annually in February.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources  Committee approves grants of awards to the HDLT, and the CEO approves grants to other employees  within parameters that the Committee has approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee has authorized  the CEO to make equity grants to employees in certain other instances, including to help recruit a  new employee or retain a current employee or to reward an employee for exceptional service or such  other instance that the CEO believes is in our best interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO may not grant equity awards to  members of the HDLT.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee has adopted a number of policies, practices and agreements to  further the goals of the executive compensation program and to strengthen the alignment of interests  of executives with the long-term interests of shareholders, which include guidelines around stock  ownership described later in this Proxy Statement in Compensation Discussion and Analysis - Stock  Ownership Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Human Resources Committee periodically reviews aspects of programs that provide  benefits to our executives that are the same benefits received by salaried employees in general.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They  include, for example, medical and dental benefits, retirement plans, employee savings plans, death  benefits and deferred compensation plans for eligible employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management reviews these programs periodically, generally with the aid of an outside consultant and revises them when necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee responsibilities identified in its Charter include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review the companys management overall to develop a CEO succession plan for  recommendation to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: lead the Board in its annual review of the Boards and its committees performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: maintain our Code of Business Conduct;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: maintain a process for review of potential conflicts of interest;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review potential conflicts of interest and other potential Code of Business Conduct  violations by our CEO or directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review and reassess annually our Corporate Governance Policy and recommend any  proposed changes to the Board for approval;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: exercise the authority of the Board to review, establish, amend and revise Board  compensation levels, plans and policies and, to the full extent permitted by rules of  the New York Stock Exchange and applicable laws, regulations and rules, exercise the  authority of the Board to adopt, administer and amend compensation plans for directors  and recommend such plans to shareholders, as appropriate and required;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: make recommendations regarding and monitor stock ownership levels of the members of the Board as set forth in our Stock Ownership Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review our policies applicable to directors regarding trading and hedging involving  company securities; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: perform other related tasks, such as studying and making recommendations to the Board  concerning the size and committee structure of the Board.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2016, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviewed the Nominating  and Corporate Governance Committee Charter and recommended certain changes to its Charter to  conform with amendments made to the Audit and Finance Committee Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all members of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee are independent under New York Stock Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee Charter outlines the criteria for identifying and  recommending new candidates to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering any potential candidate for the  Board, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee considers the following qualifications:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: principal employment;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: expertise relevant to the companys business;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether the potential candidate will add diversity to the Board, including whether the potential candidate brings complementary skills and viewpoints;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: time commitments, particularly the number of other boards on which the potential  candidate may serve;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: independence and absence of conflicts of interest under New York Stock Exchange rules  and other laws, regulations and rules;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: financial literacy and expertise; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: personal qualities including strength of character, maturity of thought process and judgment, values and ability to work with collegiality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees Charter has long required the committee  to consider diversity in its process of selecting director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the Nominating and  Corporate Governance Committee evaluates each candidate for director on, among other things,  the basis of the diversity that he or she would bring to the Board, including with respect to business  and professional experiences, skills, ethnicity and gender.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this policy has been effective  in the creation of a Board comprised of diverse members and that the composition of the current  Board reflects the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees consideration of diversity in its  evaluation and nomination process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviewed its succession planning  process in light of certain directors who were approaching the retirement age specified in our By- laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A third-party search firm assisted the Committee with its recruitment efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The search firm  recommended candidates that satisfied the Boards criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The search firm also provided research  and pertinent information regarding candidates, as the Committee requested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2016, the Board  elected two directors, Brian R. Niccol and Maryrose T. Sylvester, whom the third-party search firm  recommended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, the Board elected two additional directors, Troy Alstead and Allan  Golston.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The same third-party search firm recommended those candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider candidates that shareholders  recommend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may recommend candidates for the Nominating and Corporate  Governance Committee to consider by writing to the Nominating and Corporate Governance  Committee in care of our Secretary, 3700 West Juneau Avenue, P .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: O.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Box 653, Milwaukee, Wisconsin  53201-0653.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees policy regarding director  candidates that shareholders recommend and the process for evaluating the nominees are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder has complied with procedures to recommend director candidates that the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has established, then the Nominating  and Corporate Governance Committee will consider director candidates that the  shareholder has recommended for available seats on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HARLEY-DAVIDSON, INC. 2 0 1 7  P R O X Y  S TAT E M E N T 18
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O R P O R AT E  G O V E R N A N C E  P R I N C I P L E S  A N D  B O A R D  M AT T E R S
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making recommendations to the Board of one or more candidates to serve as  a director, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will examine  each director candidate on a case-by-case basis regardless of who recommended  the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee evaluates  candidates in the same manner whether a shareholder or the Board has recommended  the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, for each candidate that any person or group brings to the attention of the  Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee for consideration for nomination as a  director, the Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will first make  a determination whether the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee should  consider the candidate at that time based on factors the Chair deems relevant, including  our current need for qualified candidates and the Chairs view as to whether the candidate  has sufficient qualifications for further consideration for nomination as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Chair makes a determination that the Nominating and Corporate Governance  Committee should consider the candidate, then the Chair will report that determination  to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and communicate all relevant  information to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee member is responsible  for sending feedback on a candidate to the Chair.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate  Governance Committee may take any additional steps it deems necessary to determine  whether to recommend the candidate to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To enable the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee to consider a shareholder  recommendation in connection with the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, we must receive the  recommendation on or before November 20, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Submitting a shareholder recommendation to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee  does not ensure that shareholders will have an opportunity to vote on the shareholders candidate  because the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee may determine not to recommend  the candidate to the full Board or the full Board may determine not to recommend the candidate to  shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder who wants to ensure that shareholders will have an opportunity to vote  on the shareholders candidate may nominate the director candidate for the shareholders to vote on at  the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, in addition to recommending the candidate to the Nominating  and Corporate Governance Committee, by giving written notice to our Secretary in advance of the  2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To give that notice, a shareholder must comply with the terms and time periods  of our Restated Articles of Incorporation as supplemented by our By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Restated Articles  of Incorporation state that a shareholder must give written notice that complies with the Restated  Articles of Incorporation and By-laws to our Secretary not less than 60 days before the date in 2017  corresponding to the date we released this Proxy Statement to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, our Board leadership structure includes a non-executive Chairman of the Board who is an  independent director.

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Policy gives the Board the flexibility and authority  to modify this leadership structure as and when appropriate to best address the companys current  circumstances and to advance the best interests of all shareholders.

sentences.text: As a result of action taken by the  Board on February 3, 2016, and subsequent to our shareholders re-electing Mr. Cave as a director at the  2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, Mr. Cave serves as our non-executive Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board currently believes that separating the CEO and Chairman roles will enable our CEO,  Mr. Levatich, to focus on the business strategy and operations of the company, while an independent  Chairman will provide the continuity of leadership of the Board necessary for the Board to fulfill  its responsibilities.

sentences.text: The Boards Role in the Oversight of Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board has the ultimate responsibility for oversight of the risk management process, various  committees of the Board have a role in the oversight of risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, the Audit and  Finance Committee focuses on financial risk, including internal controls and a periodic review of risks  related to cybersecurity, and receives an assessment of the companys systems to monitor and manage  business risk from our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internal audit regularly reviews  risk management processes and internal controls with the Audit and Finance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and  Finance Committee also receives a report at each regular Audit and Finance Committee meeting on  legal and compliance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Human Resources Committee reviews our compensation  programs for compensation risk as we describe further in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis  section of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk management is an integral part of our annual strategic planning  process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The entire Board reviews the strategic risk management plan at least annually.

sentences.text: CERTAIN TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Policies and Procedures Governing Related Person  Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2002, our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee adopted a written policy  regarding transactions with related persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee amended this policy, which we refer to as  our Conflict of Interest Process, in December 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the policy, the Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews any  potential conflict that arises and is reported for our CEO or a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Chair of the Nominating  and Corporate Governance Committee determines that an actual conflict of interest issue exists, then  the entire Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews the potential conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee determines that an actual conflict exists, the  Committee decides whether to waive the conflict or require the CEO or director to remove the conflict.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any conflicts that are waived by our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee are promptly  disclosed to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Vice President and Chief Legal Officer reviews any potential conflict that arises for any executive  officer (other than our CEO and the Vice President and Chief Legal Officer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO reviews any  potential conflict that arises for our Vice President and Chief Legal Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Vice President and  Chief Legal Officer or CEO determines that an actual conflict of interest issue exists, the Chair of the  Human Resources Committee reviews the potential conflict.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Chair of the Human Resources  Committee determines that an actual conflict of interest issue exists, the entire Human Resources  Committee reviews the potential conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Human Resources Committee determines  that an actual conflict exists, the Committee decides whether to waive the conflict or require the  officer to remove the conflict.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any conflicts that are waived by our Human Resources Committee are  promptly disclosed to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any conflict of interest issue involving any other employee is reviewed by an attorney in our Legal  Department.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the attorney believes that an actual conflict of interest issue exists, then the attorney  submits the conflict of interest issue to our Vice President and Chief Legal Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If our Vice President  and Chief Legal Officer determines that an actual conflict exists, then he decides what steps should  be taken to resolve the conflict.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Linebarger, a director, is the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Cummins Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During  2016, we continued a modest commercial relationship with Cummins, a relationship that existed  before Mr. Linebarger joined the Board of Directors, under which we purchased exhaust parts  and components from subsidiary companies of Cummins Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The transactions were negotiated  on an arms-length basis and were well below the applicable threshold under New York Stock  Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the relationship does not prevent Mr. Linebarger from qualifying as an  independent director and the Board considers Mr. Linebarger to be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because  Mr. Linebarger is the current Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, the  entire Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee (excluding Mr. Linebarger) considered this  relationship under our Conflict of Interest Process, and it determined that no actual conflict of interest  issue exists as a result of the relationship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C E R TA I N  T R A N S A C T I O N S
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. James, a director that is not standing for re-election at our Annual Meeting, is Director  and President and an equity owner of Fred Deeley Imports Ltd. (Deeley Imports), which was  the exclusive distributor of the companys motorcycles in Canada until August 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to  Deeley Imports relationship with the company, the Board does not consider Mr. James to be an independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In April 2015, the company and Deeley Imports entered into an asset purchase agreement that  resulted in the companys acquisition of certain assets from Deeley Imports on August 4, 2015 and  the termination of the exclusive distribution agreement between the company and Deeley Imports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the asset purchase agreement, in 2015, the company made a termination payment to  Deeley Imports and acquired certain assets of Deeley Imports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company also entered into certain  office and warehouse leases and transition services agreements with Deeley Imports and Fred Deeley  Investments Ltd., an affiliate of Deeley Imports that is controlled by Mr. James, that became effective  on August 4, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the company paid approximately $864,940 CAD in lease payments  under the office and warehouse leases, and there were no payments under the transition services  agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The parties are continuing to address post-closing adjustments and similar matters under  the asset purchase agreement, including reimbursement during 2016 from the company to Deeley  Imports under the agreement for $978,892 CAD relating to severance payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the basis that  the company negotiated the transactions contemplated by the asset purchase agreement, including  the leases and transition services agreements, on an arms-length basis and such transactions were  reviewed and approved by a special committee of the Board of Directors consisting of directors  who had no interest in the transactions, the Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance  Committee considered these related party relationships under our Conflict of Interest Process, and he  determined that no actual conflict of interest issue existed as a result of the relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the termination of the distribution agreement between the company and Deeley Imports, the  company entered into dealer agreements with approximately 66 dealers in Canada, all of which had  preexisting dealer agreements with Deeley Imports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These new Canadian dealer agreements included  an agreement with Trev Deeley Motorcycles for the operation of a Harley-Davidson dealership located  in Richmond, British Columbia.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Trev Deeley Motorcycles is owned by the Darren James 2014 Trust,  of which Mr. James is the sole trustee and his son, Darren James, is the sole beneficiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we  recorded motorcycles and related products revenue from Trev Deeley Motorcycles of $606,934 CAD  and financial services revenue of $1,230 CAD.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The terms of the dealer agreement with Trev Deeley  Motorcycles were negotiated in the ordinary course of business and contain terms and conditions  that are substantially similar to all of the companys other Canadian dealer agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of  the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has considered this related party relationship  under our Conflict of Interest Process, and he determined that no actual conflict of interest issue exists  as a result of the relationship.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
