sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E X E C U T I V E  C O M P E N S AT I O N
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Harley-Davidson Employee Savings Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have qualified section 401(k) savings plans for employees, which we believe are competitive with  other similar companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligible participants can make contributions to the plan up to the Internal  Revenue Code limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide participants with matching contributions of up to either 4.5%, for  defined contribution eligible employees, or 3%, for defined benefit eligible employees, of their eligible  compensation based upon the extent to which they make elective deferrals and based upon their  date of hire.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Non-Qualified Deferred Compensation Plan, we pay participants amounts that  we would have provided as matching contributions under the Savings Plan if statutory limits that apply to the Savings Plan as a plan qualified under the Internal Revenue Code had not been applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All  NEOs participate in this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HDMC has long maintained a qualified non-contributory, defined benefit pension plan which covers  HDMC U.S. salaried employees who were hired prior to August 1, 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning August 1, 2006, we have not allowed new participants into this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Levatich and Olin and Ms. Kumbier  participate in this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HDMC Restoration Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HDMC has long maintained a non-qualified Pension Benefit Restoration Plan pursuant to which we  pay participants amounts that would have been accrued under or payable from the Harley-Davidson  Retirement Annuity Plan if statutory limits that apply to the Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity  Plan as a plan qualified under the Internal Revenue Code had not been applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning  August 1, 2006, we have not allowed new participants into this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Levatich and Olin and  Ms. Kumbier participate in this plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Compensation Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain a Non-Qualified Deferred Compensation Plan for salaried employees in which a group of  highly-compensated employees (as defined by the Internal Revenue Code) are eligible to participate,  including the senior leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the terms of this plan, participants can defer a portion of their  base salary and a portion of their annual STIP payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a participant in this plan makes an election  to defer eligible compensation and there are statutory limits on such participants ability to defer at  least 6% of eligible compensation into the qualified employee Retirement Savings Plan, then the  participant will also receive company matching contributions in this plan that would have been made  in the qualified plan if no statutory limit had been applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe earnings on amounts deferred  reflect the returns available in the market as investment options in the Deferred Compensation Plan  that are participant-directed are similar to those that exist in our 401(k) plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This plan is structured to  comply with Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our NEOs is eligible to participate in  the Deferred Compensation Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: O t h e r  E m p l o y e e  P r o g r a m s
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide the opportunity for substantially all employees, including the senior leaders, to purchase  eligible Harley-Davidson products (including motorcycles, Parts and Accessories, and General  Merchandise) and receive a reimbursement from the company for a portion of the purchase price  paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives also participate in other employee benefit programs, such as our employee stock  purchase program, paid time off, retiree healthcare account accrual (closed effective 1/1/2017)  and disability insurance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have standard compensation packages applicable to relocations and  overseas assignments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 41
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E X E C U T I V E  C O M P E N S AT I O N
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: O t h e r  S e n i o r  L e a d e r s  P r o g r a m s
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Historically, we provided certain senior leaders, including the NEOs, who retire after reaching age  55 and after attaining five or more years of service a benefit in lieu of providing post retirement life  insurance consisting of payment equal to two years base salary at retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive is  responsible for all taxes associated with this payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This benefit is not available to individuals that  we hired after 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, Messrs. Olin and Hund are eligible to receive this benefit upon their  retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the case of the remaining NEOs, they become eligible for this benefit after reaching  age 55 and upon their retirement from the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide senior leaders, including all NEOs, with a limited financial planning and tax preparation  benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The senior leader is responsible for all taxes associated with this payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NEOs are  eligible to receive an annual executive physical.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We permit limited use of our corporate aircraft by NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have entered into time sharing  agreements with executive officers, including the NEOs, to provide terms governing personal use of  corporate aircraft and to require the executive officers to pay for each personal flight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount that  an executive officer pays for each personal flight is equal to the greater of the aggregate incremental  cost to the company for such flight and the Standard Industry Fare Level (SIFL) valuation used to  impute income for tax purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In all cases, the CEO must approve all personal use, and any  business use for our corporate aircraft takes priority over a NEOs request for personal use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, to further promote the Harley-Davidson brand and the recognition of senior leaders as  representatives of the company at rallies and other industry events, senior leaders receive an annual  allowance for the purchase of MotorClothes apparel of $3,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The senior leader is responsible for all  taxes associated with this clothing allowance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: N A R R AT I V E  T O  P E N S I O N  B E N E F I T S  TA B L E
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain the Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity Plan which is a noncontributory defined benefit pension  plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this plan, our salaried employees (excluding employees of HDFS and certain other subsidiaries,  such as Mr. Hund), including Messrs. Levatich and Olin and Ms. Kumbier, are generally eligible to retire with  unreduced benefits at age 62 or later.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Jones is not eligible to participate as the plan was closed to new  participants in 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits are based upon monthly final average earnings as defined in the Harley-Davidson Retirement  Annuity Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The monthly benefit is 1.2% of the final average earnings plus 0.4% of the final average earnings  in excess of Social Security covered compensation multiplied by years of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each eligible named executive officer, final average monthly earnings equal one-twelfth of the highest  average annual total compensation (consisting of base salary, annual bonus and annual non-equity incentive  compensation as shown in the Summary Compensation Table) paid over five highest total compensation  years within the last ten years of service prior to the participants retirement or other date of termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation under any long-term incentive plan that we maintain, including equity or cash plans, is not  eligible compensation for purposes of the pension or pension benefit restoration plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 49
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: E X E C U T I V E  C O M P E N S AT I O N
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vesting under the Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity Plan occurs upon the earlier of five years of  service or age 65.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An employee who retires after age 55 and before age 62 with a minimum of five  years of service will receive an actuarially reduced benefit under the Harley-Davidson Retirement  Annuity Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The surviving spouse of an employee who is eligible for early retirement or who is vested  at death is also entitled to certain benefits under the Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We adopted the Pension Benefit Restoration Plan pursuant to which we will pay participants  amounts that exceed certain limitations the Internal Revenue Code imposes on benefits payable  under the Harley-Davidson Retirement Annuity Plan as a plan qualified under the Internal Revenue  Code and to counteract the effect of participation in the Harley-Davidson deferred compensation  plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approximately 100 employees participate in the Restoration Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives in the plan as of  December 31, 2008 made an irrevocable election to receive their benefit from the Restoration Plan as  either a single lump sum payment or a monthly payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We computed the present value of each NEOs accumulated benefit using the same assumptions and  measurement date that we used for financial reporting purposes for our 2016 financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each active named executive officer that was eligible to receive benefits as of the end of the year,  we assumed a retirement age of 62, which is the earliest age at which a NEO may retire under the  relevant plans without any reduction to benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain executives who retired prior to January 1, 2016 were entitled to receive a lump sum payment  equal to one years salary plus applicable taxes upon retirement at or after age 55 with 5 years of  service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For retirements after January 1, 2016, certain executives are entitled to receive a lump sum  payment equal to two years salary upon retirement at or after age 55 and 5 years of service with no  provision for taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We adopted this defined benefit in lieu of providing post-retirement life insurance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hund and Mr. Olin were the only NEOs who were eligible to receive this benefit as of December 31,  2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The other NEOs were not entitled to this benefit as of December 31, 2016 because they would  not have satisfied the eligibility requirements as of that date.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have transition agreements with Messrs. Levatich, Olin and Hund.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each agreement provides that, if  we terminate the individuals employment for any reason (other than for cause) within two years after a  change of control, then such individual will receive a cash payment and certain other benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition,  among other events, voluntary termination by the executive of his or her employment for good reason  within two years after a change of control would entitle the executive to the benefits under the agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We describe the transition agreements more fully in the section Compensation Discussion and Analysis- Employment and Transition Agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That section also outlines the definition of a change of control under  the transition agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our incentive stock plans also contain provisions that apply if there is a change of control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity awards that  we made under our 2009 and 2014 Incentive Stock Plans to an executive who was then a party to a transition  agreement do not become fully vested upon a change of control (but may become vested if we terminate the  individuals employment for any reason other than cause within two years after a change of control).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other  restricted stock awards, performance share awards, restricted stock units and option grants that we made  under our 2009 and 2014 Incentive Stock Plans and predecessor plans that are unvested become fully vested  upon a change of control.

sentences.text: Under the transition agreements, to the extent that payments to executives would be considered excess  parachute payments as defined in Section 280G of the Internal Revenue Code, the payments will be reduced to  a point at which they are no longer considered excess parachute payments, or the executive will receive the full  payment and be personally liable for the excise tax, whichever produces the larger after-tax benefit to the executive.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To  receive a severance payment under this policy, the executive must agree to a number of restrictive  covenants and execute a general release of claims against the company.

sentences.text: If a NEO dies while employed, in addition to the benefits to which we refer immediately following the  heading Payments Made Upon Termination above and the amounts we disclose above relating to  restricted stock and restricted stock unit awards, the NEO will receive payments under our death  benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our death benefits provide that each NEO is entitled to three times annual base salary in the  event of his or her death while actively employed, which we would generally satisfy out of proceeds of  life insurance that we maintain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each NEO, we report premiums that we paid for this life insurance  as part of All Other Compensation in the Summary Compensation Table.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we maintain  long-term disability plans in which NEOs may participate on a voluntary basis on the same terms as  other salaried employees.

sentences.text: There is no company contribution toward the cost of this benefit.

sentences.text: Under the form of our transition agreement, if the NEOs death occurs during employment, then no  benefits are payable under the agreement.

sentences.text: In addition, under all forms of our transition agreement, if  a NEO dies after a termination that entitles the NEO to a cash payment, or if a NEOs death during  active employment after a change of control entitles the NEOs estate to a cash payment, then health  benefit coverage for the NEOs eligible dependents will continue until the earlier to occur of one year  following the executives death or three years following the executives termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other welfare  benefit coverage will cease at the date of the NEOs death.

sentences.text: For compensation purposes, we generally define retirement as separation from service on or after  attainment of age 55 with at least five years of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When an individual who satisfies these criteria  leaves service, we consider him or her a retiree for purposes of certain compensation and benefit  programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An executive who has received a cash-based long-term incentive award or a performance  share award will receive a payout on a pro-rata basis for each award that we granted to the executive  before his or her retirement date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The payment amount under each of these awards is based upon the  actual months of employment since the date of the award divided by the 36-month life of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Actual payments will only be made upon the completion of the performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An executive  will receive a payout in respect of a STIP award relating to the year in which he or she retires on a  pro-rata basis based upon their actual pay during the year in which they retire and the actual STIP  performance of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity awards granted at least 12 months prior to the date of retirement  vest on the date of retirement.

sentences.text: These benefits are in addition to those that we disclose above under  Pension Benefits.

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, two of our NEOs, Messrs. Olin and Hund, were eligible to retire and  would receive certain benefits (as described above) upon retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Director Stock Plan, a non-employee director may elect to receive 0%, 50%, or 100%  of the annual retainer fee to be paid in each calendar year in the form of shares of our common stock  based upon the fair market value of common stock at the time of our annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, non-employee directors receive an annual grant of share units, each representing the  right to receive one share of our common stock and therefore having the value of one share of our  common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also pursuant to our Director Stock Plan, directors may choose to defer the receipt of their annual  retainer fees payable in cash or shares of common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferrals of fees payable in shares of  common stock are credited to a share account, are treated as if invested in common stock, and  ultimately will be paid in common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferrals of fees payable in cash are credited to a cash  account and will earn a return based on investment options that we make available to the director  and that the director selects.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director will receive his or her deferred compensation following  cessation of his or her service on the Board in compliance with applicable rules regarding deferred  compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of our Director Stock Plan is to further align the interests of outside directors with  shareholders by providing for a portion of annual compensation for the directors services in shares of  common stock or share units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we provide to non-employee directors a clothing allowance of $1,500 to purchase Harley- Davidson MotorClothes apparel and accessories, along with a discount on our products that is the  same discount available to all U.S. employees of HDMC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may also provide a director with the use  of a motorcycle where doing so may further our business objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 61

sentences.text: NOMINATING AND CORPORATE  GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has empowered the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee to continuously  review our corporate governance practices and to make recommendations to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee regularly reviews our Corporate Governance  Policy, encourages the continuing education of Board members, provides Board members with  access to senior management and defines each Board members responsibility to attend meetings  and review all pre-meeting materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our global compliance and ethics program, we have a Code of Business Conduct that  applies to all of our employees, officers and Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have a Supplier Code of  Conduct that applies to our suppliers and their agents who do work on behalf of Harley-Davidson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Business Conduct reporting helpline, website and telephone numbers are designed  to provide employees and suppliers with the opportunity to ask Code-related questions or report a  potential Code violation throughout the world (where legally allowable).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chief Legal Officer reports  to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee on matters relating to the companys  global compliance and ethics program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have in effect the Conflict of Interest Process that  the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Business  Conduct, Supplier Code of Conduct, Conflict of Interest Process, Corporate Governance Policy and  each of the four committee Charters appear on the Corporate Governance page of our website at  http://investor.harley-davidson.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance page of our website contains information about how our  shareholders can contact Board members if they have questions or issues of concern for the Board  and other information relating to the companys corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not including the  information available through our website as a part of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in its Charter, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee leads the Board  in an annual review of the performance of the Board, the Boards committees and the Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews the independence of each  director and examines all relationships, if any, a director has with the company to determine if that  relationship is material.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has determined  that two current directors (Messrs. James and Levatich) are not independent and has reviewed the  very limited business relationships that one other director has with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We disclose this  relationship in the Certain Transactions section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Nominating and Corporate  Governance Committee are independent in accordance with New York Stock Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the Audit and Finance Committee (formerly the Audit Committee) was comprised of six  members, five of whom are current directors and three of whom (Messrs. Linebarger, Miles and Zeitz)  the Board determined to be audit committee financial experts within the meaning of SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All  Audit and Finance Committee members are independent and financially literate pursuant to New York  Stock Exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee Charter provides that the independent auditor is accountable  to the Audit and Finance Committee and to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee has the  ultimate authority and responsibility to appoint, retain, evaluate and, where appropriate, replace  the independent registered public accounting firm serving as the companys independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Audit and Finance Committee will seek shareholder ratification of its choice of  independent auditor at Harley-Davidsons annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee has reviewed and discussed with management its assessment  of the effectiveness of Harley-Davidsons internal control system over financial reporting as of  December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has concluded that the internal control system was effective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Harley-Davidsons internal control over financial reporting as of December 31, 2016 was  audited by Ernst & Young LLP , Harley-Davidsons independent auditor for the 2016 fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee has reviewed and discussed Harley-Davidsons audited financial  statements for the 2016 fiscal year with management as well as with representatives of Ernst &  Young LLP .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee has also discussed with Ernst & Young LLP matters  required to be discussed under Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) Auditing  Standard No. 16, Communications with Audit Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee has  received written disclosures from Ernst & Young LLP regarding their independence as required by  PCAOB Ethics and Independence Rule 3526, Communication with Audit Committees Concerning  Independence, and has discussed with representatives of Ernst & Young LLP the independence of  Ernst & Young LLP .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the review and discussions referred to above, the Audit and Finance Committee has  recommended to the Board that the audited financial statements for the 2016 fiscal year be included  in Harley-Davidsons Annual Report on Form 10-K for the 2016 fiscal year for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Audit and Finance Committee of the Board of Directors James A. Norling, Chair  N. Thomas Linebarger  George L. Miles, Jr.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maryrose T. Sylvester  Jochen Zeitz
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 63
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SHAREHOLDER PROPOSALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a shareholder intends to present a proposal at the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders and  desires to have us include that proposal in our proxy materials for that meeting under Rule 14a-8  under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, then the shareholder must ensure that we receive the  proposal by November 20, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder who otherwise intends to present business at the  2018 annual meeting of shareholders must comply with the requirements set forth in our Restated  Articles of Incorporation as supplemented by our By-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Restated Articles of Incorporation  and By-laws contain specific requirements with which a shareholder must comply.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, our  Restated Articles of Incorporation state that a shareholder must give written notice that complies  with the Restated Articles of Incorporation as supplemented by our By-laws to our Secretary not less  than 60 days before the date in 2018 corresponding to the date we released this Proxy Statement to  our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because we anticipate mailing the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials  on March 20, 2017, we must receive notice of a proposal for shareholders to consider at the 2018  annual meeting of shareholders that a shareholder submits other than pursuant to Rule 14a-8 no later  than January 19, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we receive the notice after January 19, 2018, then we will consider the notice untimely and we will  not have an obligation to present the proposal at the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the  Board chooses to present a proposal that a shareholder submits other than under Rule 14a-8 at the  2018 annual meeting of shareholders, then the persons named in the proxies that the Board requests  for the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders may exercise discretionary voting power with respect to  the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HARLEY-DAVIDSON, INC. 2 0 1 7  P R O X Y  S TAT E M E N T 64
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THE  ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  What is the purpose of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   (1) To elect ten directors to the Board of Directors; (2) to approve, by advisory vote, the  compensation of our named executive officers; (3) to consider the frequency of the advisory  vote on compensation of our named executive officers; (4) to ratify the selection of Ernst &  Young LLP , independent registered public accounting firm, to be the auditors for the fiscal  year ending December 31, 2017; and (5) to take action upon any other business as may  properly come before the Annual Meeting and any adjournments or postponements of the  meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Annual Meeting of Shareholders and this Proxy Statement describe  these matters in more detail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, members of management will report on our 2016  performance and, once the shareholders conclude the business of the Annual Meeting,  respond to shareholders questions as time permits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Who can attend the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   All shareholders of Harley-Davidson, Inc., or individuals that shareholders have duly  appointed as their proxies, may attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appointing a proxy in response  to this request will not affect a shareholders right to attend the Annual Meeting and to vote in  person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To attend the Annual Meeting, please follow these instructions:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If shares you own are registered in your name or if you own shares through our Dividend  Reinvestment Plan, to enter the Annual Meeting, please bring a form of photo identification  and either (1) proof of your ownership of our common stock or (2) the Notice of Internet  Availability of Proxy Materials; or if you hold your shares in street name (that is, through  a broker, bank or other nominee), to enter the Annual Meeting, please bring a copy of a  brokerage statement reflecting your ownership of our common stock or other proof of  ownership through such broker, bank or nominee and a form of photo identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   A majority of the 175,627,299 shares of our stock outstanding on February 23, 2017 must  be present, in person or by proxy, to provide a quorum at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote,  your shares will count toward satisfying the quorum requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you return a proxy card  or otherwise submit a proxy marked ABSTAIN or without voting instructions, your shares  of common stock will also count toward satisfying the quorum requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, in those  instances where banks, brokers or other nominees who hold shares on behalf of others have  returned a proxy but could not vote the shares on particular matters without receiving voting  instructions from the beneficial owners (broker nonvotes), those shares will count toward  satisfying the quorum requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares in street name, we encourage you to  provide voting instructions to your broker, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once a share is counted  as present at the Annual Meeting, it will count as present for quorum purposes throughout  the Annual Meeting (including any adjournment or postponement of that meeting unless a  new record date is or must be set for the adjournment or postponement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Who is entitled to vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Only holders of the 175,627,299 shares of our common stock outstanding as of the close of  business on February 23, 2017, can vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of these shareholders  has one vote for each share of our stock held on that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 65
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q U E S T I O N S  A N D  A N S W E R S  A B O U T  T H E  M E E T I N G
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   If the records of our transfer agent show that you own shares in your name or if you own  shares through our Dividend Reinvestment Plan at the close of business on February 23,  2017, then you may vote (1) via the internet at http://www.proxyvote.com, (2) in person at  the Annual Meeting, (3) by mail or telephone after first requesting a printed copy of this Proxy  Statement, proxy card and Annual Report on Form 10-K and following the instructions set  forth on the proxy card, or (4) by telephone after reviewing the Proxy Statement and Annual  Report on Form 10-K at http://www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares in street name, you  may vote via telephone or the internet if your bank, broker or other nominee makes those  methods available, in which case your bank, broker or other nominee will provide instructions  with your Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and internet voting procedures will authenticate  your identity, allow you to give your voting instructions and confirm that we properly recorded  your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote via the internet, you should understand that there might be  costs associated with electronic access that you must bear, such as usage charges from  internet access providers and telephone companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  What is the effect of not voting at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   The consequences of not voting at the Annual Meeting will depend on how you own your  shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the records of our transfer agent, Computershare Investor Services LLC, show that  you own shares in your name or if you own shares through our Dividend Reinvestment Plan  and you do not vote, we cannot consider those shares present at the meeting and they will  not count toward satisfying the quorum requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares in street name and do not vote, your broker, bank or other nominee may  vote your shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not give voting instructions for your shares, your  broker, bank or other nominee may or may not be able to vote your shares in its discretion  depending on the proposals before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker, bank or other nominee may  vote your shares in its discretion on routine matters such as Proposal 4, the ratification of the  selection of our independent registered public accounting firm, but may not vote your shares  in its discretion on the other Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares in street name, we encourage you  to provide voting instructions to your broker, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Can I change my vote after I submit my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can change your vote at any time before the Annual Meeting by submitting a new  proxy or by providing written notice to our Secretary and voting in person at the Annual  Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your presence at the Annual Meeting does not in and of itself revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also are invited to attend the Annual Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, because a beneficial  owner is not the shareholder of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the  Annual Meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy from the bank, broker or other nominee that  holds your shares, giving you the right to vote the shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you properly revoke your proxy, the persons you have appointed will vote your shares  at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you specify a choice by means of the proxy, the persons you have  appointed will vote your shares as you specify.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not specify a choice, the persons  you have appointed will vote your shares in accordance with the recommendations of the  Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Is my vote confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   We will handle all proxy instructions, ballots and voting tabulations that identify individual  shareholders carefully to protect your voting privacy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No one will disclose your vote either  within Harley-Davidson or to third parties, except: (1) as necessary to meet applicable legal  requirements; (2) to allow for the tabulation of votes and certification of the vote; and (3) to  facilitate a successful proxy solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HARLEY-DAVIDSON, INC. 2 0 1 7  P R O X Y  S TAT E M E N T 66
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q U E S T I O N S  A N D  A N S W E R S  A B O U T  T H E  A N N U A L  M E E T I N G
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Who will count the vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. will count the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Its representative will serve as the  inspector of the election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Who pays to prepare and solicit the proxies?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   We pay the cost of soliciting the proxies relating to the Annual Meeting, except for some  costs that may arise through your use of the telephone and internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may request proxies  in person, by telephone, internet and facsimile machine, as well as through the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  also expect to ask banks, brokerage houses and other custodians, nominees or fiduciaries  to forward proxy materials to their principals and to obtain proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will reimburse these  institutions for their out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  How can I obtain printed copies of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   If you are a shareholder, you may receive a printed copy of the proxy materials by  following the instructions below, which also appear in the Notice of Internet Availability of  Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you want to receive a printed copy of this Proxy Statement, proxy card and/or Annual  Report on Form 10-K, you must request one.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is NO charge by the company for  requesting a copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please choose one of the following methods to make your request:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.proxyvote.com 1-800-579-1639 sendmaterial@proxyvote.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request printed materials by email, please send a blank email that includes the control  number that appears in your Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials in the email  subject line.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you access documents electronically, you should understand that there might  be costs to access materials electronically that you must bear, such as usage charges from  Internet access providers and telephone companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests, instructions and inquiries sent to the email address above for purposes other  than requesting a printed copy of this Proxy Statement, proxy card and Annual Report on  Form 10-K will NOT be reviewed or accommodated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please make the request as instructed  above on or before April 12, 2017, to facilitate delivery prior to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After  April 12, 2017, you may request printed copies of this Proxy Statement and/or Annual  Report on Form 10-K, but not a proxy card, by contacting the companys Investor Relations  Department directly by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) mail at Harley-Davidson, Inc., Attention: Investor Relations,  3700 West Juneau Avenue, P .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: O.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Box 653, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53201-0653,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) telephone  at 877-HDSTOCK (toll-free) or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) email at investor.relations@harley-davidson.com.

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .

sentences.text: C O M 67
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THE  COMPANY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  How is management structured?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Harley-Davidson, Inc. operates in two business segments- the motorcycles and related  products segment and the financial services segment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The motorcycles and related  products segment includes companies that do business as Harley-Davidson Motor  Company (HDMC).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The financial services segment includes Harley-Davidson Financial  Services (HDFS).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our organizational structure consists of the Harley-Davidson Leadership Team (HDLT) and a  broad group of our leaders representing key functions and key individuals of Harley-Davidson  that we refer to as senior leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HDLT consists of the Chief Executive Officer of Harley-Davidson, Inc., as well as the  President of HDFS and other senior officers who report directly to the Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of the HDLT are responsible for making decisions on business issues that  impact our entire company, developing high-level policies and advising our Chief Executive  Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) purposes, we consider the HDLT  members our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, the SEC requires executive officers to  disclose publicly their holdings of and transactions involving our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Who are our executive officers for SEC purposes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   As of February 23, 2017, our executive officers for general SEC purposes were as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Name and Title Age Matthew S. Levatich, President and Chief Executive Officer, Harley-Davidson, Inc. 52 We have employed Mr. Levatich for approximately 22 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Levatich became our  President and Chief Executive Officer effective May 1, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: John A. Olin, Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Harley-Davidson, Inc. 56 We have employed Mr. Olin for approximately 14 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lawrence G. Hund, President and Chief Operating Officer, Harley-Davidson Financial Services 60 We have employed Mr. Hund for approximately 6 years and previously employed him  for approximately 5 years prior to 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michelle A. Kumbier, Senior Vice President, Motor Company Product and Operations,  Harley-Davidson Motor Company 49 We have employed Ms. Kumbier for approximately 21 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Paul J. Jones, Vice President and Chief Legal Officer, Harley-Davidson, Inc. 46 We have employed Mr. Jones for approximately 7 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sean J. Cummings, Senior Vice President, Global Demand, Harley-Davidson Motor Company 54 We have employed Mr. Cummings for approximately 3 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Joanne M. Bischmann, Vice President, Communications of Harley-Davidson, Inc. 55 We have employed Ms. Bischmann for approximately 26 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tchernavia Rocker, Vice President, Human Resources, Harley-Davidson, Inc. 43 We have employed Ms. Rocker for approximately 17 years.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q U E S T I O N S  A N D  A N S W E R S  A B O U T  T H E  C O M PA N Y
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Bischmann, Mr. Hund and Mr. Olin have served in their respective current capacities  for more than five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have employed the executive officers identified below in their  respective current capacities for less than five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is additional biographical  information for at least the last five years relating to these executive officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Levatich became our President and Chief Executive Officer in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that time, he served as President and Chief Operating Officer of HDMC since 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Kumbier has been with Harley-Davidson since 1997 and, since 2015, has been  Harley-Davison Motor Companys Senior Vice President, Motor Company Product and  Operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2012 to 2015, she was Senior Vice President of Motorcycle Operations,  and from 2010 to 2012, she was our Senior Vice President, Product Development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Jones became our Vice President, Strategy and Sustainability and Chief Legal Officer  in February 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined the company in 2010 as Vice President, General Counsel and  Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cummings has been with Harley-Davidson since 2014 and has served as our Senior  Vice President, Global Demand since October 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2014 to 2015, he was our Vice  President, Latin America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining our company, Mr. Cummings served as President  and COO of Milsco Manufacturing Company (a manufacturer of seating products) from 2009  until he joined the company in 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Rocker has been with Harley-Davidson since 2000 and, since July 2016, has been our  Vice President, Human Resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2014 to 2016, she served as General Manager  Human Resources and from 2012 to 2014 she served as Senior Director, Human Resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the executive officers listed above, Mark R. Kornetzke is our Chief Accounting  Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have employed Mr. Kornetzke for approximately 20 years and he has served in  his current role since 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Does Harley-Davidson have a chief compliance officer?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board first appointed a chief compliance officer in 2004.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Paul J. Jones, our Vice  President and Chief Legal Officer, is our current Chief Compliance Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appointing a chief  compliance officer was part of the Boards commitment to compliance and its desire to  promote compliance, education and reporting within our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This action formalized  our continuing efforts to direct and promote an effective compliance program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among  other things, under this compliance program, management is required to report significant  compliance issues to the Legal Department when they occur.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compliance program also  includes training to employees, including senior management, on corporate governance  issues including anti-bribery, ethics, privacy, insider trading restrictions and restrictions on  disclosure of nonpublic material information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company has a global compliance and  ethics training program managed by an attorney from our Legal Department and other  employees who manage corporate governance, compliance and records management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee and Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee  receive quarterly reports on legal and compliance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: H A R L E Y- D A V I D S O N .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: C O M 69
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q U E S T I O N S  A N D  A N S W E R S  A B O U T  T H E  C O M PA N Y
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Does Harley-Davidson have a disclosure committee?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2002, we established a Disclosure Committee comprised of members of  management responsible for considering the materiality of information and making disclosure  decisions on a timely basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If necessary, a subset of the Disclosure Committee comprised  of the Chief Financial Officer and the Chief Legal Officer is authorized to fulfill the functions  of the Disclosure Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the following information and documentation are  not provided along with this Proxy Statement, the Disclosure Committee Guidelines provide  that the Disclosure Committee: (1) has access to all company books, records, facilities  and personnel, as well as our independent registered public accounting firm and outside  counsel; (2) designs, establishes and maintains disclosure controls and procedures for the  SEC reporting process and modifies them from time to time, as appropriate; (3) creates and  reviews all financial press releases; (4) reviews SEC filings on Form 8-K relating to quarterly  earnings releases, Form 10-K and Form 10-Q and our annual proxy statement; (5) suggests  appropriate disclosures or provides opinions on disclosure issues; (6) evaluates changes  in SEC, New York Stock Exchange and Financial Accounting Standards Board disclosure  rules and makes recommendations regarding their impact on the company; (7) consults  with management, internal auditors, independent accountants and outside legal counsel;  (8) discusses material items with employees in the internal audit function, independent  registered public accounting firm and management to ensure appropriate disclosure;  (9) arranges for necessary training to ensure effective implementation of the disclosure  controls and procedures; and (10) annually reviews and reassesses the performance of the  Disclosure Committee and these guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:   Does Harley-Davidson have a policy for communicating material non-public information?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The companys Policy for Managing Disclosure of Material Information describes the  procedures relating to communication with the public, the investment community and third  party business contacts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy can be found on the Corporate Governance page of our website at http://investor.harley-davidson.com
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Does Harley-Davidson have an internal audit department?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The head of the internal audit function reports directly to both the Audit and Finance  Committee and our Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit and Finance Committee Charter  specifically provides that the head of the internal audit function is accountable to the Board of  Directors and the Audit and Finance Committee and that the Audit and Finance Committee  has the ultimate authority and responsibility to appoint, retain, evaluate and replace the head  of the internal audit function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information on the internal audit function, please see  the Audit and Finance Committee Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Where can I find corporate governance materials for Harley-Davidson?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   The Corporate Governance page of our website at http://investor.harley-davidson.com  contains our Corporate Governance Policy, our Conflict of Interest Process for Directors,  Executive Officers and Other Employees, our Code of Business Conduct, our Financial  Code of Ethics, our Policy for Managing Disclosure of Material Information, the charters  for the Audit and Finance Committee, Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee,  Human Resources Committee and Sustainability Committee, our By-laws, a list of the  Board of Directors, our Statement on Conflict Minerals, California Transparency in Supply  Chain Act Disclosure, Political Contributions and Engagement and the Clawback Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not including the information available through our website as a part of this Proxy  Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Does the company have a code of business conduct?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   The Board of Directors first adopted our Code of Business Conduct in 1992 and the Board  amended and restated it in each of 2003 and 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Code of Business Conduct applies  to all of our employees, including all executives and directors, and promotes honest and  ethical conduct and provides guidance in handling various business situations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is available  worldwide to our employees on our intranet and on the Corporate Governance page of  our website at http://investor.harley-davidson.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where allowed by law, employees  may anonymously report possible violations of the Code of Business Conduct by calling  a third-party toll-free telephone number that is available 24 hours a day and seven days a  week, via a third-party internet website or by writing to our Chief Legal Officer at the following  address in care of our Secretary: Harley-Davidson, Inc., 3700 West Juneau Avenue, P .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: O.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Box 653, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53201-0653.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees may also report possible violations  to their supervisor, their local human resources department, their local legal department,  or the Chief Legal Officer and Chief Compliance Officer of Harley-Davidson, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more  information, please see the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Q:  Does the company have a financial code of ethics?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A:   Employees in key senior management positions, including the HDLT, and in areas that  provide support to the finance and accounting areas, sign our Financial Code of Ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Financial Code of Ethics was most recently revised in November 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees may  report possible violations of the Financial Code of Ethics via the Code of Business Conduct  reporting line or directly to the Chair of the Audit and Finance Committee, in care of our  Secretary: Harley-Davidson, Inc., 3700 West Juneau Avenue, P .
